      • GetLengthString

        public static java.lang.String GetLengthString​(long lengthInBytes)
        Format file size for UI
        Parameters:
        lengthInBytes - the files size in bytes
        Returns:
        the file size formatted for human consumption

      • GetTimeRemainingString

        public static java.lang.String GetTimeRemainingString​(long timeRemainingMillis)
        Get the amount of millis specified formatted for UI display of time remaining for an ongoing task, or for an elapsed amount of time
        Parameters:
        timeRemainingMillis - the time representation in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the formatted as hours minutes seconds

      • GetTimeRemainingOrDateString

        public static java.lang.String GetTimeRemainingOrDateString​(long now,
                                                            long elapsed,
                                                            boolean bDate)
        Similar to GetTimeRemainingString, but not only useful for ongoing tasks, as it will display a date if the specified time range is more than 1 week
        Parameters:
        now - time now
        elapsed - time to display
        bDate - true to display date for >1week, false to display "2 weeks ago"
        Returns:
        the time remaining string

      • parseTimeRelativeToNow

        public static java.lang.String parseTimeRelativeToNow​(java.lang.String timestamp)
        Parse the ISO 8601 timestamp and format it relative now e.g. 5 min ago
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the ISO 8601 timestamp
        Returns:
        the resulting offset from the current time in human language.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the download speed string

      • log2

        public static double log2​(double v)
        Implementation of base 2 logarithm using the straightforward unoptimized method of log(x)/log(2).
        Parameters:
        v - the input value to used.
